expression: A<-Proy[name](Sel[age>30](Person2));B(p1)<- Proy[pizza](A|X|Eats);C(p)<-B;D<-Sel[p<>p1](C X B);Proy[pizzeria](Serves) - Proy[pizzeria](Sel[pizza<>p AND pizza<>p1](Serves X D))
expectedExpression: $$\mathsf{A \gets \pi_{(name)}(\sigma_{(age > 30)}(Person2))}$$$$\mathsf{B_{(p1)} \gets \pi_{(pizza)}(A \bowtie Eats)}$$$$\mathsf{C_{(p)} \gets B}$$$$\mathsf{D \gets \sigma_{(p <> p1)}(C \times B)}$$$$\mathsf{\pi_{(pizzeria)}(Serves) - \pi_{(pizzeria)}(\sigma_{(pizza <> p \land pizza <> p1)}(Serves \times D))}$$
